title: PM Ranil Wickremesinghe sworn in as Sri Lanka’s new Finance Minister
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe was sworn in as the country’s new Finance Minister, as well as Minister of Economic Stability, and National Policies.
He took oaths as the Finance Minister in the presence of President Gotabaya Rajapaksa on Wednesday (25).
